todos.title: Costs
todos.body: What is your cost of not solving this problem?

todos.title: Growth
todos.body: What are your growth plans?

todos.title: Switch
todos.body: Why are you changing firms?

todos.title: Standards
todos.body: What service standards do you have of us?

todos.title: Privacy
todos.body: What privacy issues do you have and are there certain pieces of information or meetings you want us to stay away from?

todos.title: Stresses
todos.body: What keeps you up at night?

todos.title: Model
todos.body: What is you business model?

todos.title: Restrooms
todos.body: What is the state of your restrooms?

todos.title: Highest Value
todos.body: What is the most value to you?

todos.title: Expectations
todos.body: What do you expect from us?

todos.title: Pains
todos.body: What are your current problems?

todos.title: Alternative
todos.body: What are your alternatives (products and competitors) to this solution?

todos.title: Success
todos.body: What are you company's success factors/key predictive indicators?

todos.title: Associates
todos.body: May we contact your associates for information?

todos.title: Lottery
todos.body: If price were not an issue what would you have us do?

todos.title: Turnaround
todos.body: How quick do you expect responses to e-mails and delivered product?

todos.title: Newness
todos.body: How new is your firm?

todos.title: Decision Timeline
todos.body: How much time do you have to select a firm?

todos.title: Value
todos.body: How do you see us adding value?

todos.title: Referral
todos.body: How did you hear about us?

todos.title: Boomerang
todos.body: Have you returned after pricing elsewhere (usually means pricing is too low and customer is only focused on price ' not a great customer)

todos.title: Options
todos.body: Are you pricing with other firms?

todos.title: Who's Money
todos.body: Are you paying with your money or billing this out?
